function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dynamic human-building interactions influencing virus transmission","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in the built environment","Mitigation":"Implementing ventilation systems and air purification technologies, promoting hand hygiene and surface disinfection, and enforcing mask-wearing and social distancing policies","Technologies":"Ventilation systems, air purification technologies, hand hygiene products, surface disinfection products","People":"Occupants, building facility management","Owner":"Building facility management"},{"Description":"Customization of space configurations and occupant behaviors for occupancy simulation","Impact":"Inaccurate or biased results leading to ineffective decision-making support","Mitigation":"Providing guidelines and best practices for customization, validating simulation results with real-world data, and incorporating diverse scenarios and input parameters","Technologies":"Simulation algorithms, real-world data validation, scenario modeling tools","People":"Architects, facility planners, decision-makers","Owner":"Architects, facility planners, decision-makers"},{"Description":"Lack of understanding routes of virus transmission in specific conditions","Impact":"Increased risk of overlooking potential virus transmission routes and implementing ineffective design decisions or policies","Mitigation":"Utilizing situated visualization and timeline-based visualization techniques to analyze the routes of virus transmission, and incorporating feedback from experts and stakeholders","Technologies":"Situated visualization tools, timeline-based visualization tools, stakeholder feedback mechanisms","People":"Architects, facility planners, decision-makers, experts","Owner":"Architects, facility planners, decision-makers"}]}
